metadata.title: pycryptodome: side-channel leakage for OAEP decryption in PyCryptodome and pycryptodomex (low)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in PyCryptodome and pycryptodomex, before 3.19.1. This issue may allow side-channel leakage for OAEP decryption, which could be exploited to carry out a Manger attack. 
            STATEMENT: Red Hat OpenStack 16.1 and 16.2 versions include affected python-scciclient embedded through the python-crypto package, however, python-scciclient employs only one algorithm, which is AES. While the version of python-crypto we ship may be susceptible to a particular CVE, since affected algorithms are not utilized by OpenStack, the attack cannot be executed to exploit an OpenStack deployment

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
python3-crypto is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
